## MessageNotificationProps type

MessageNotification event properties schema: iglu:com.snowplowanalytics.mobile/message\_notification/jsonschema/1-0-0

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type MessageNotificationProps = {
    action?: string;
    /*
    * Attachments added to the notification (they can be part of the data object).
    */
    attachments?: MessageNotificationAttachmentProps[];
    body: string;
    /*
    * Variable string values to be used in place of the format specifiers in bodyLocArgs to use to localize the body text to the user's current localization.
    */
    bodyLocArgs?: string[];
    bodyLocKey?: string;
    category?: string;
    contentAvailable?: boolean;
    group?: string;
    icon?: string;
    notificationCount?: number;
    notificationTimestamp?: string;
    sound?: string;
    subtitle?: string;
    tag?: string;
    threadIdentifier?: string;
    title: string;
    titleLocArgs?: string[];
    titleLocKey?: string;
    trigger: Trigger;
};
```
